product_name: Patagonia Wind Shield Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: This lightweight and packable women's Patagonia Wind Shield jacket blocks cold winds without compromising breathability. Jacket is great for fast-paced winter adventures such as cross-country skiing. Main body of jacket is constructed with a windproof polyester fabric that has a polyurethane film sandwiched between face and backing for exceptional windproof performance. Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) stretch fleece panels under arms and at cuffs enhance breathability and quick drying performance. Deluge(R) Durable Water Repellent finish sheds light snow and rain. Full-length zipper has a draft flap to prevent the chill from seeping through; tall collar has a brushed fleece lining for next-to-skin comfort. 2 zippered hand pockets; zippered lower back pocket features an internal cord pass-through for easy cable routing to your media player. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Slightly dropped tail increases coverage; single-pull drawcord at hem helps seal out the elements. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. Fitted design fits close to the body. Closeout.
short_description: This lightweight and packable women's Patagonia Wind Shield jacket blocks cold winds without compromising breathability. Jacket is great for fast-paced winter adventures such as cross-country skiing.
